Params: {3: 'The gaze from the dream detaches from the body, overlooking the entire world like a ghost from above.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student A', 3: 'Hello, do you need any help? I just noticed you seemed a bit out of it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Hello, my name is Lucia. My frame designation is BPL-01, Lotus, and I'm also the team leader of Gray Raven—"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't regret what I just did. I had to tell Vanessa and my former teammates about my will as a soldier and member of the Gray Ravens.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The unknown isn't always unsolvable. Sometimes, true hope can be found in the unknown... I know you will always choose to stand by my side, and that's exactly why I'm bound to succeed.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "...Once it's released, whether through Luna, who failed the re-filtering, or through Cradle, its fusion with the Ascension-Network is inevitable. The only question is who will take control.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The key is quite complete... Perhaps she truly can become a nearly perfect "return ticket".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A tranquil, stable world that feels both comfortable and strangely alien.'}
{3: 'The viewpoint suddenly elevates, revealing a blue planet on the edge of sight. From the far reaches of the cosmos, the pink-haired woman approaches with measured grace.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Finally can control your own eyes, finally can see it all...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pauses for a moment, her voice revealing a hint of sudden realization.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Finally... able to obtain the true ticket.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Eyes snapping open, the gaze sinks into the Hetero Tower. The surroundings are completely silent, as if nothing has ever happened.'}
{3: 'The agitation of the Hetero Tower is soothed by Chaos, who emerged from the Red Tide.'}
{3: 'The fissures flowing with red liquid gradually seal themselves, as the scattered butterfly wings on the ground are wholly assimilated into the tower.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Cradle's residual power fills the fissures in the tower's body. Chaos slowly lowers her gaze, feeling the power of Agent Zero."}
{1: '1', 3: "With absolute command over Agent Zero's power, your gaze can now truly merge with this form so intimately linked to you."}
{3: "The doll's peculiar voice echoes throughout the Hetero Tower."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'How does it feel... to obtain such power?', 4: '1'}
{3: "With the authority of Agent Zero, time and space within the Hetero Tower feel like compressed glass spheres, able to shift in accordance with the wielder's volition. However..."}
{3: 'Tentatively, Chaos attempts to control the Hetero Tower.'}
{3: "After risking death countless times to claim Agent Zero's authority, securing the Hetero Tower's core while caught between Vonnegut and Cradle..."}
{3: 'The doll repeatedly draws power from the Hetero Tower, attempting to halt its growth, trying to reverse everything back to the correct path...'}
{3: 'But no matter what actions are taken, the Hetero Tower gives only the faintest response.'}
{3: 'The tower trembles, responding weakly to its newborn master, like a sculpture hewn from glass that could collapse at any moment with just one more touch.'}
{1: "Why? Why the Hetero Tower still can't be used?!", 3: '70', 4: 'ffffffff', 6: '1'}
{3: "Why? Why the Hetero Tower still can't be used?!"}
{3: 'As if the previous moment of bewilderment was merely an illusion, the doll intensifies her movements.'}
{3: "Ignoring her call, the doll's movements grow increasingly violent, and the Hetero Tower emits an earth-shattering wail."}
{3: 'Complex "information" floods into her mind as the towering Hetero Tower continues to "grow" without cessation.'}
{3: 'Throughout the fluctuations of the past and future, it has never ceased growing upward.'}
{3: 'The power of grief converges, on the verge of tearing everything apart, yet suddenly freezes in a single moment.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '400'}
{1: '2', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '240'}
{1: '3', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '80'}
{1: '4', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '-80'}
{1: '5', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '-240'}
{1: '6', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=70>WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY WHY</size></color>', 4: '-400'}
{3: 'The lofty deity resembles a fish stranded out of water, gasping and near death from desiccation. Though her expression remains unchanged, a melancholic aura pervades the tower.'}
{3: "The doll's voice is etched with despair."}
{3: 'The tower spirals upward, with tendrils sprouting in all directions.'}

{3: "Due to Vonnegut and Cradle's reckless movements through the tower earlier, even though Chaos has successfully obtained Agent Zero's authority, the information within the tower has grown exponentially..."}
{3: 'The pink-haired woman gazes at the weeping newborn "deity", a compassionate smile playing in her eyes.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Is it that you can't use it... or that you dare not?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson tower spirals upward to touch the heavens, threatening to collapse at any second. Different "layers" of the tower undergo repeated fission, splitting apart again and again.'}
{3: 'The "past" and "future" altered through the Hetero Tower haven\'t disappeared—their "cornerstones" continue to stack precariously, teetering on the brink of collapse.'}

{3: 'If the "deity" attempts to return to the "previous layer" or intervenes to change everything while her power\'s bedrock remains unsteady, the infinitely stacked information may crumble imminently.'}
{2: "You knew this would happen, didn't you?", 3: '279'}
{3: 'Why... She has done everything she can... Why is she still unable to change the schemes of fate...'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "...Like me, you're able to see beyond the ordinary world."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Like me, all that\'s left of you here is also just a "projection".'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Essentially, we are the same kind of existence, and our endings... are destined to be alike.'}
{3: 'The vast sea of stars explodes at the edge of the universe, stardust scatters in all directions, and misty clouds spread throughout.'}
{3: 'Her gaze penetrates through countless universes, settling upon... this world.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We will eventually meet at the end of the world.'}
{3: 'Bearing their broken civilizations, they will journey together through the depths of starlit skies and oceans until they find a new shore.'}
{3: 'The newborn "deity" opens her eyes filled with blood and tears.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But you no longer have the power to save this place...'}
{2: "Everything I've done is not meant for an ending like this.", 3: '311', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{3: 'Power gradually grows, wings stretching to obscure the sky and sun. Every dark pupil harbors the spectrum of emotions, gazing upon the world chaotically amassed by the Hetero Tower.'}
{3: 'The Red Tide slowly dries up, its contained "information" slowly absorbed by the doll.'}
{2: 'I will prune the branches of the Hetero Tower and dismantle the layers that should never have existed.', 3: '315', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'I will push everything... back to the "past".', 3: '316', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: "Back to the time before the Hetero Tower's arrival.", 3: '317', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You'll be overwhelmed by excessive information, completely losing yourself."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Things are fine as they are... aren't they?"}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The Punishing Virus will preserve everything of this civilization. One day, we'll find a way to restore it."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But if you continue absorbing this endless stream of information caused by Vonnegut and Cradle...'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You'll lose your mind from being unable to bear all this information."}
{3: 'Ishmael takes a step back, gazing at Chaos whose pupils swirl with turbulence.'}
{2: 'Not so that I can give up here.', 3: '329', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Please forgive me... I'll have to stay in the past for now.", 4: '101'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But you will press on, far beyond, until you reach the place where everyone can be brought back.', 4: '101'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, Lee... and our other companions... They didn't leave Earth because they abandoned it... They left to look for hope in places far beyond... to look for you.", 4: '101'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When that time comes... if you still want to, come find me.', 4: '101'}
{3: 'What I<//COMMANDANT> left in this world is more than just a "projection".'}
{3: 'Brilliant light scatters in all directions as time freezes in this moment.'}
{3: 'Innumerable red threads manifest, omnipresent, coiling around the Hetero Tower and ensnaring the entire Earth.'}
{3: 'The gate of the stellar sea is forcibly pushed open. Myriads of shards drift along the river of time.'}
{1: 'Here, I will <color=#ff4e4eff>reshape</color> the time of human civilization.', 3: '70', 6: '1'}
{3: 'Here, I will <color=#ff4e4eff>reshape</color> the time of human civilization.'}
{3: 'The threads, carrying red and golden shards with them, gradually expand, enveloping the entire blue planet.'}
{3: 'Death and rebirth, joy and lamentation blanket the vast stellar sea.'}
{2: '????', 3: 'Babylonia... the Punishing Virus has caught up...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Even animals have begun mutating too. No one can escape...'}
{2: '?', 3: "I'm here to say goodbye to you..."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Why... was I born into a world like this...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She hears sorrowful, lingering sighs, and the countless "voices" of humanity.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She takes into herself all the redundant echoes pruned from human civilization.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Infinite causality and time crowd her M.I.N.D., leaving only murmurs by her ears—merged, cacophonous, yet indistinct.'}
{3: 'Her consciousness shatters countless times, only to solidify and reconstruct itself just as often.'}
{3: 'Star clusters appear and vanish, congealed in the cosmos, eternal and unchanging.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=65>They<//HUMANITY> are filled with joy, welcoming the arrival of new life.</size></color>'}
{3: 'They<//HUMANITY> are filled with joy, welcoming the arrival of new life.'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=65>They<//HUMANITY> raise their blades against invaders in fury—</size></color>'}
{3: 'They<//HUMANITY> raise their blades against invaders in fury—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Countless years of "information" amassed by the Hetero Tower flow ceaselessly into her M.I.N.D. Civilizations lament the final requiem in sorrowful song.'}
{3: 'The "deity", teetering on the brink of madness, wrapped in countless strands of "time", rampages recklessly through the Hetero Tower.'}
{3: 'She obliterates all in her path, witnessing a myriad of "endings" belonging to humanity and beings beyond.'}
{1: 'She sees the weapons of "THEM" descend, effortlessly crushing an entire planet into a thin slice.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'She sees planets shrouded by eerie red mist, devoid of even a whisper.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1'}

{1: 'She sees day and night reversed by the "rules", the ground becoming beyond reach as life drowns in the deep sea.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'She sees a "sun-like" star expanding, its scorching energy engulfing an entire stellar region...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 7: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Unintentionally, Chaos, teetering on the edge of insanity, halts in front of a gate bearing the symbol of a four-winged white raven.'}
{3: 'Hazy memories surge from the depths of her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '...One of the entrances to the graveyard.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Since you\'ve been reading "my" story all this time...', 3: '586', 8: '2', 11: '1'}
{3: 'Beneath the intersecting threads of fate, she gives a serene smile.'}
